message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth more than that to you, and I'm willing to negotiate further.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'd like to offer $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand your offer and appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still hoping to get closer to $10,000.  I'm willing to come down to $9,750. How does that sound?
I'm still a bit short on budget, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,200. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  While $9,200 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to reach a price closer to $9,500.  How about $9,350? This would represent a good deal for both of us.
I'm still a bit hesitant, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,150. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand you're sticking to your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway this time. How about $9,250? This is my final offer, I'm not sure I can go lower than this.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,200. Can you meet me at this price?
